thread.title: Seibels Appoints Fiona Cantrell Vice President of Financial Services

author: cnbc.com
title: Seibels Appoints Fiona Cantrell Vice President of Financial Services

organizations.name: seibels appoints fiona cantrell vice president of financial services

text:
COLUMBIA, S.C.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Seibels is pleased to announce the promotion of Fiona Cantrell to Vice President of Financial Services. In this newly established role, Cantrell will be responsible for overseeing the company’s financial services operations, including all direct bill, receivable accounting, and quality assurance activities for Seibels’ business process services (BPS) and third party administration (TPA) clients.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180208005774/en/
Fiona Cantrell, Vice President, Financial Services (Photo: Business Wire)
“I am thrilled to announce Fiona’s promotion to Vice President of Financial Services,” said Rex W. Huggins , Chairman & CEO, Seibels. “Fiona possesses a strong understanding of accounting practices, process improvement, and financial systems. Her industry expertise and ability to drive business processes to improve efficiency for clients make her an instrumental member of the Seibels leadership team.”
Cantrell joined Seibels in 2013 as Director of BPO Financial Operations. She was promoted to Assistant Vice President of BPO Financial Operations in 2016. Prior to Seibels, Cantrell was Vice President of Financial Operations at CIT, a NYSE listed commercial lending firm. At CIT, she gained experience in the areas of financial operations, internal controls, Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX), business analysis, and system implementations. Prior to CIT, Cantrell worked in public accounting and internal auditing for firms in New York City and Boston.
Cantrell graduated from the Darla Moore School of Business at The University of South Carolina with a major in Accounting. Cantrell is a member of the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants and the South Carolina Association of Certified Public Accountants.
About Seibels
The Seibels Bruce Group, Inc. (Seibels) offers the Property and Casualty insurance industry a suite of business process services (BPS) and third party administration (TPA) services powered by world-class technology. Streamlined operations, improved efficiencies and predictable, managed costs are just some of the benefits clients receive when working with Seibels. By leveraging a strong combination of insurance experience and industry-leading technology, Seibels best-in-class insurance services allow insurance carriers and risk managers to simplify business processes and maximize opportunities so they can focus on growth and development. Seibels’ services support Commercial and Personal lines of business. Since its founding in 1869, Seibels has recognized the value of quality customer service, strong client relations, continuous innovation and integrity. For more information, please visit www.seibels.com . Follow us on twitter: @SeibelsITS .
